sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { UseSelector, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Header from '../Layer/Header' const NewsDetails = () => { let newsDetails = useSelector((store) => store.newsDetails.newsDetails) if (!newsDetails) newsDetails = window.localStorage.getItem('newsDetails') return (

{newsDetails?.title}

{newsDetails?.source?.name} | {newsDetails?.publishedAt}

{newsDetails?.content}

) } export default NewsDetails
